sec.title: N/A
sec.p: Wiles PR . 2005 . First collections of water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) from Honduras: descriptions of six new species . Journal of Natural History 39 ( 3 ): 253â€“263 .

Due to a production error, low-quality copies of the illustrations were used instead of the high-quality versions provided by the author. We therefore reproduce the complete article on the following pages as it should have appeared.
